pinSettingScreen.indicateTouchId: Indicate if Touch ID should be
pinSettingScreen.indicate1: Any fingerprints registered with Touch ID on this device WILL have access tp your Wallet.

pinSettingScreen.indicate3: If you tap cancel at the Touch ID prompt, you can still authorize transactions with your Authorization PIN.
